entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
